lead_paragraph: New York State officials said that they had not been able to persuade the head of the federal Department of Homeland Security to give them more grant money to prevent or respond to terrorism attacks.

headline.main: U.S. Refuses More Money for New York in Terror Fight
headline.print_headline: U.S. Refuses More Money For New York In Terror Fight

snippet: New York State officials said that they had not been able to persuade the head of the federal Department of Homeland Security to give them more grant money to prevent or respond to terrorism attacks.
